answers.answer: You should be having monthly prenatal check-ups at this point in your preganacy.  Your last one was at 20? You should have had one at 24 and 28 weeks. Call and schedule something.  You're due for your first gestational diabetes test too.
Strange I have Kaiser as well and I am 24 weeks. They usually schedule my 4 week appts 2 at a time so you should talk to the nurse next time and make sure she schedules you sooner!

question: So I am currently 27 weeks along about to be 28 weeks and I haven't had a doctors appointment since week 20. Is this normal? They haven't called me to schedule anything and I am getting quite worried. I called and all they did was put me on hold for hours . I have kaiser and they haven't done anything yet I am getting so annoyed
title: Doctors
